item.title: libyan rebels move west toward sirte

item.title: nato strikes destroy libyan helicopters: rebels

item.title: nasdaq open to selling amex in nyse bid: report

item.title: colombia says rebel camps gone from venezuela

item.title: nasdaq open to selling amex in nyse bid: source
